query:
SELECT 
            COALESCE(SUM(
                CASE 
                    WHEN t.transaction_sponsorship_fee IS NOT NULL 
                    THEN t.amount - t.transaction_sponsorship_fee
                    ELSE t.amount
                END
            ), 0) as revenue
        FROM transactions t
        JOIN tickets tk ON t.ticket_id = tk.id
        JOIN ticket_types tt ON tk.ticket_type_id = tt.id
        WHERE 
            tt.event_id = $1 
            AND t.status = 'completed'
            AND t.currency = 'USDC'
